azurerm_batch_certificate.description: Manages a certificate in an Azure Batch account.

account_name.description: Specifies the name of the Batch account. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Batch account. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

certificate.description: The base64-encoded contents of the certificate.

format.description: The format of the certificate. Possible values are `Cer` or `Pfx`.

password.description: The password to access the certificate's private key. This must and can only be specified when `format` is `Pfx`.

thumbprint.description: The thumbprint of the certificate. At this time the only supported value is 'SHA1'.

id.description: The ID of the Batch Certificate.

name.description: The generated name of the certificate.

public_data.description: The public key of the certificate.

create.description: Used when creating the Batch Certificate.

update.description: Used when updating the Batch Certificate.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Batch Certificate.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Batch Certificate.
